transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Uh sir very good evening. Main Shriya baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan ji bataiye.
Executive: Actually Vikas ji, aap se baat hui thi aur aapne WhatsApp par na uska feedback not satisfied diya hai. To aap mujhe ek baar problem bataiye sir kya face kar rahe hain?
Customer: Madam kuch bhi nahi aa raha. Aap jo mujhe side bhejte hain wo bahut mere jo main area de raha hu usse bahut alag hai. Ye aap Delhi ki Delhi ka bhej dete hain wo Delhi ki jab mere paas aati hai jab wo out of wo jab me nikal chuki hoti hai.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Dekhiye jo bhi sir hamare paas available hai.
Executive: Jo bhi sir UP ki hai wo to hum aapko provide karwa hi rahe hain. Aaj actually main dekh pa rahi hu ki aapki jo buyleads ki consumption hai na sir wo kaafi kam hai. Theek hai? Jo main ye bhi dekh pa rahi hu ki jo Delhi ki kuch leads hai na wo sold out ho jati hai aur aap usko buy nahi karte ho. To last time bhi maine aapko yahi guide kiya tha sir ki koshish karo.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: To last.
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan sir wo aap laga diya teen teen cheez ka matlab plastic laga diya hu. Plastic laga diya hu.
Customer: Complete ho gaya?
Customer: Complete nahi hua.
Customer: Pehle isko to pehle beech mein aao plastic laga.
Customer: Complete to kar do.
Customer: To sir dhakna padega usse.
Customer: Agar complete ho sakta hai to complete kar do abhi to time bahut hai beta.
Customer: Paper lena padega to sir chipkne wala. Yaar aap paper leke jaunga.
Customer: Chalo theek hai. Haan.
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello haan ji sir.
Customer: Haan ji madam.
Executive: Sir ye keh rahi hu sir ki jo bhi Delhi ki jo buyleads aa rahi hai na matlab main ye nahi keh rahi hu zyada hai. Jo bhi hai 50% 30% buylead hai usko kaafi kam ratio mein buyleads ko buy kar rahe ho. Aur jo baaki ke jo buyleads hai na wo sold out ho ja rahe hain. To aap koshish karo.
Customer: Madam mere paas jo aapki buyleads hai nahi koi. Mere area ki to 10% buyleads aap de rahe hain. Jo mujhe buyleads de rahe hain saari ki saari aap dikhate hain Punjab ki. Maine area hi nahi kar rakha. Gorakhpur. Maine area hi nahi le rakha. Jo main area de rakha hu aap uski buyleads dijiye na mujhe. Aap aise itni lambi lambi buylead mujhe denge Karnataka ki, Kerala ki to kya fayda mujhe un buyleads ka?
Executive: Sir aap filter laga ke use karte ho to kitni baar maximum dikhti hai?
Customer: Awaaz aa rahi hai sir?
Customer: Jab aapne kahi thi jab mere se mujhe diya tha ki itni buyleads to aapko wo milengi jo hum confirm karke denge aapko.
Customer: Aisa kuch bhi nahi hua ek baar bhi nahi hua aisa.
Executive: Sir Delhi ki buyleads kuch to buyleads har din andar andar buyleads ko buy kar lo. Theek hai? Abhi maine UP ki buylead hai na filter lagani. To mujhe Agra UP se Korean acrylic acid ki dikh rahi hai, Bareilly se dikh rahi hai, two buys dikh rahi hai. Original laga leti hu.
Executive: Buy lead sir sold out dikh raha hai kyuki aapki jo buyleads ki consuming matlab like time hai, sir consume mein jo time hai wo main dekh pa rahi hu wo kaafi kam hai sir. Kaafi kam matlab sir aap 0.0% aur normally aur ye October mein 66%.
Customer: Ek minute ek minute. Maine abhi khol rakha hai. Aapne mujhe Bhiwani Haryana ki de rakhi hai. Kya maine ye area liya hua hai?
Customer: Uske baad Agra Uttar Pradesh chalo ye to phir bhi Uttar Pradesh ke aa gayi.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Uske baad aa gayi hamare paas Ambala Haryana. Na mere paas ye area hai madam. Siliguri West Bengal. Mere matlab ki nahi hai madam. Hyderabad Telangana. Teri Rajasthan. Kya ye area to thode buyleads to thode UP side se kam available hai. Theek hai? But koshish karo aap zyada. Ek baar aap lead manager mein jao sir lead manager mein main Ghaziabad se dekh rahi hu, Meerut se dekh rahi hu.
Executive: Ab Ghaziabad wale ko aap phone milaiye mere samne. Wo buylead hi nahi hai.
Executive: Buylead nahi hai sir main lead manager.
Customer: Customer ne uthate hi mujhse ye kaha ki customer ne uthate hi mujhse ye kaha ki sir wo kya naam hai wo phone number hi wo maine maine to search nahi kiya.
Executive: Ek baar ek baar.
Customer: Mere ko to requirement nahi hai.
Executive: Ghaziabad wale se baat hui aapki jo unko lead manager mein inquiry aayi hai?
Customer: Lead manager mein
Executive: Meerut Meerut Meerut se jo aayi hai aapko Meerut se aayi hai 14th November ko aayi hai. Ye sab aap reply lead manager se karte ho tabhi jaake to ye flow banegi na sir ek pattern banegi na sir.
Customer: Lead manager se hi kari hai.
Customer: Ghaziabad ke Santosh ji se aap keh rahe ho na? Hmm. Ye dekhiye 26 second meri baat hui hai unse.
Executive: Accha kya aaya ye Navneet Bhayana karke hai. Navneet Bhayana karke hai sir. Baat hui hai inse?
Customer: Ye phone hi nahi utha rahe.
Executive: Phone nahi utha rahe WhatsApp kariye aapne?
Customer: Main abhi aapke samne baat karta hu inse dekho baat baat kuch ho rahi hai nahi. Main abhi dusre number se call kar raha hu.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Ab isse kya kehte hai mujhe requirement hi nahi hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Navneet ji.
Executive: Theek hai ek baar main thoda sa aapka aapke paas kuch photos wagera hai apne project ka to aap mujhe share kijiye main WhatsApp pe hi bolti hu thoda catalog wagera mein kuch aur add. Madam maine photos 50 baar de diye koi mera photo add nahi hota. Koi aap edit nahi karte sabse badi problem to madam ye hai. Aapka ban aap sab sab cheez online hi chahte ho. Aapka banda kabhi bhi hum matlab itne paise aapko dete hain kya ek banda aapka hamare paas aake hamare sath baith ke hamara wo nahi bana sakta?
Executive: Sir jab aap IndiaMART register karwa rahe the to aapko ye cheez clear nahi kiya gaya tha ki matlab like abhi jaise karwane ke baad IndiaMART ka adoption aa jata hai.
Customer: Nahi jis cheez mein hume problem aa rahi hai uska solution bhi to aap hi denge.
Executive: Haan solution bilkul denge sir abhi hum baithe hain aapko service dene ke liye baithe hain. Solution hota hi nahi to phir fayda kya hai madam ye bataiye. Jab phone pe baat hone ke baad wo solution nahi hota. To kam se kam aapko apne dealer ka ye dhyan rakhna chahiye apne customer ka ki uske paas jaaye.
Executive: Main aapko guide karti hu sir theek hai ab yahan se ek hafta ispe kaam karte hain then phir aage. Ya phir tarika ye bhi hai ki bhai aap chalo aap log nahi aa sakte aapka Noida mein hi aapka office hai hum log to Noida mein bhi aa sakte hain hum aap aap hume time dijiye hum aapko.
Executive: Noida aate hi koi problem nahi hai aap office aate hi hum aapke liye.
Customer: Hum apna apne samne baith ke hum tayar karwaenge ki hume ye chahiye isme ye chahiye isme ye chahiye isme ye chahiye.
Executive: Theek hai aap aa jaiye sir jab bhi aap Noida aaiye aap mujhe bataiye main aapko meeting fix karwa deti hu sir theek hai? Aapke ghar aana ho gaya.
Executive: Theek hai sir?
Customer: Madam mujhe ab apna address bhejiye.
Executive: Theek hai main aapko WhatsApp karti hu hi theek hai aapko main address wagera bhejti hu aap mujhe bataiye aur ek baar kal aap free hain kya?
Customer: Nahi kal free nahi hu.
Executive: Kal main aapke sath ek baar video meet karna chah rahi thi sir.
Customer: Kal Sunday ko to nahi ho paane ka bilkul bhi madam.
Executive: Monday ko free hai aap? Monday to off hai hamara Tuesday ko free hai aap?
Customer: Tuesday ko kar.
Executive: Chaliye Tuesday ko ek baar karti hu aur ek baar hai na bas mujhe aapke 10 se 15 minute lungi cheeze samajh ke main thoda catalog wagera sahi karti hu. Phir aapko Delhi matlab jo UP aur Delhi ki jo leads wagera hai uspe ek baar hai na main aapko active karati hu aur phir ek baar flow ban jayega sir dekho 100% to main nahi bol sakti lekin haan 30 to 40% aap UP aur Delhi ki leads wagera dekh sakte ho usme se consume kar sakte ho. Thoda active bhi kam hua aap PNS call bhi thoda answer ek jo bhi aapko aati hai usme se.
Customer: Madam active hota hu dekhta hu kuch bhi mere matlab ka nahi phir main band ho jata hu kya karu?
Executive: Theek hai sir pehle hum catalog pe kuch photos wagera kuch videos wagera add on karte hain then phir uspe hai na discussion karte hain aur aapko proper main active karwati hu phir dekhte hain kya hota hai ispe. Theek hai sir?
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai to main ye concern close kar rahi hu ek baar dekhna aap WhatsApp pe ye ye main ID pe aapko ek jayega aap ek baar meri se baat ho gayi hai ek baar aap yes kar dena sir theek hai?
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting relevant buyleads.

- Photos are not being added to catalog.

- Wants a physical representative to assist.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to fix catalog issues.

- Executive offered a meeting in Noida office.

- Executive will activate UP and Delhi leads.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will visit Noida office on Tuesday.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, area, meeting, subscription
